alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 7:42PM CDT until August 05 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Colbert County in northwestern Alabama... Eastern Franklin County in northwestern Alabama... Southwestern Lawrence County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 742 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Russellville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russellville, Moulton, Phil Campbell, Littleville, Mt Hope, Srygley Church, La Grange, Tharptown, Ne Smith and Duketon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
